title: One Argument why Sion should Get a traditional skin

embed.description: Q&A IS OVER FOR TODAY, THANKS EVERYONE! We're getting back to work making sure Sion is ready to hit the live servers as soon as possible.** http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/pages/sio/img/sio-wallpaper.jpg Hey guys, We've gathered a bunch of Rioters from the Champion Update team for some Sion Q&A.

body:
Hello Riot, 

Its' been 2 years since reworked Sion was released and I just want to put it out there again, please give Sion a traditional skin. I would like to put down one argument:

- quoting IronStylus from Sion Champion Update Q&A "..'Also, speaking to the audience of Sion players, the voice is really specifically an NA component..."  He goes on to state in comment further below "...while English speakers and fans of Western media that involves Arnold is charming to us, we're sort of in the minority actually. By a wide margin the accent, the mannerisms, the reference, aren't understood by a huge chunk of the world."

My counter point below:

Please consider Brolaf that went internationally; I listened to voice overs from the other regions and what it says to me is that you (Riot) assume that the world knows more about fraternity and sorority college culture/american 60's hippie culture more than they do about pop -Arnie movie culture? I'm pretty sure Arnie wins out hands down!

Sion Deserves Traditional Skin. 

Thank you.

Too bad Riot stop making Traditional skin only after making 3 skins. Out all the things I miss about the old Sion was him telling people to â€œGet on my Chopper" is what I miss most. Even if we don't get the Arnie voice back he still should get a traditional skin with his original dialogue

A good point, but the ship's already sailed man. Like you said, it's been two years, and riot won't put the resources to do this now after so long. Besides, they said they wanted to stop doing traditional skins in general.

He should get a traditional skin because they completely changed what he looked like.

If you had shown me the new poppy and taric splash arts two years ago, I would have been like, oh cool! Poppy got a rework  but had you shown me the new sion splash before his rework, I probably would think it was another champion.
